description:
From one of the authors of Urban Shadows:
"Because I have a sickness, I went ahead and adapted Masks into a game I am affectionately calling Jedi Hearts (a play on words inspired by Monsterhearts).
In Jedi Hearts, you play students in Luke Skywalker’s Jedi Academy (or another similar scenario from another SW era) who have to deal with their tremendous power, the burdens of the Jedi code, and who they have a crush on." 
Here is the original project: https://www.dropbox.com/s/n683xbhk90i17lt/Jedi%20Hearts.pdf.

I have added more precisions regarding conditions and GM advices and I tweeked a playbook move or two so it fits with the other playbooks and so it can be played in distant past eras as well. I also added 7 playbooks, all inspired from the numerous Masks supplements and from two fanmade playbooks, the Backseat https://docs.google.com/document/d/17k8prAuw2Rhk6qRfTQTSgDBWgNYEe-4ANDuqZQxsyZw/... and the Youth https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Htnv5KQdEgOROsfkO7TbwvyfJTj6e43nf_t0vQcwhBM/....
This is entirely free. Enjoy!

Fonts used are Orbitron, Chakra Petch and Star Jedi Outline.

Star Wars is owned by Lucas Arts which is owned by Disney and absolutely no profits are made or will ever be made by me from this product.
